greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(j,k) in which row j lists the parts in nondecreasing order of the j-th region of the set of partitions of n, with 1<=j<=A000041(n).
comment: For the definition of "region" of the set of partitions of n see A206437.
example: First 15 rows of the irregular triangle are
xref: Positive terms of A186114. Mirror of A206437.
Row j has length A194446(j). Row sums give A186412.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jan 27 2013
